name: MRCell3D
description:
A spreadsheet program with 3 Dimensions. --- Alpha Version ---

You can setup your sheet with formulas and  data and move with a third dimension .

In this example I create a sheet with an Invoice and move from one Invoice to other with the third dimension on the left.

This is a project I started many years ago and i never released, it is still alpha. there a lot of think that doesn't work:

Still to finish:

  • Copy / Paste
  • Repeat cells
  • Better formula creation (now you have to write them)
  • Better Printing
  • etc.
